Package pl.polsl.wojciech.siudy.messenger.model

Class Session

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.wojciech.siudy.messenger.model.Session
public class Session extends Object
Class holding current application session data and configuration. It is initialized at startup, after necessary information from user is collected.
See Also:
  • SessionController
  • SessionView

  • Constructor Details

    • Session

      public Session(User currentUser, String address, Integer portIn, Integer portOut)
      Class constructor with full specification.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - name used as a message signature
      address - host that application will connect with
      portIn - port that will be open for incoming messages
      portOut - port through messages will be sent
